verses.name: 1 Kings 13:10
verses.text: So he went another way, and returned not by the way that he came to Beth–el.

verses.name: 1 Kings 13:11
verses.text: Now there dwelt an old prophet in Beth–el; and his sons came and told him all the works that the man of God had done that day in Beth–el: the words which he had spoken unto the king, them they told also to their father.

verses.name: 1 Kings 13:12
verses.text: And their father said unto them, What way went he? For his sons had seen what way the man of God went, which came from Judah.
